feed.title: Andreas Aabrandt
feed.subtitle: Applied scientist and engineer with 8+ years building production AI/ML systems. Specializing in LLM development, agent systems, and translating research into business impact. Founder of Crosswind ApS and Pionero ApS.

entry.title: Welcome to emacs.io
entry.summary: Welcome to my technical blog and portfolio site. I’m Andreas Aabrandt, an applied scientist and engineer specializing in production AI/ML systems. What You’ll Find Here This site serves as a space where I share insights, projects, and technical explorations at the intersection of: AI & Machine Learning: LLM development, agent systems, fine-tuning techniques, and production deployment ...
